subject: Football
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Take the Pittsburgh Steelers and the Baltimore Ravens, throw in trash-talking, bounties and spittle, mix well, and the N.F.L. has one of its most animated rivalries.
snippet: Take the Pittsburgh Steelers and the Baltimore Ravens, throw in trash-talking, bounties and spittle, mix well, and the N.F.L. has one of its most animated rivalries.
